text:
I think lines 36-54 can be refactored to just
```    u, v, w = model.velocities
    ζ = ComputedField(∂y(w) - ∂z(v))
    fields = (; u, v, w, ζ)

    global_attributes = Dict("Re" => Re)
    output_attributes = Dict("ζ" => Dict("longname" => "vorticity", "units" => "1/s"))

    field_output_writer =
        NetCDFOutputWriter(model, fields, filename="lid_driven_cavity_Re$<http://Re.nc|Re.nc>", schedule=TimeInterval(0.1),
                           global_attributes=global_attributes, output_attributes=output_attributes)```

elements.text: I think lines 36-54 can be refactored to just

    ζ = ComputedField(∂y(w) - ∂z(v))
    fields = (; u, v, w, ζ)

    global_attributes = Dict("Re" => Re)
    output_attributes = Dict("ζ" => Dict("longname" => "vorticity", "units" => "1/s"))

        NetCDFOutputWriter(model, fields, filename="lid_driven_cavity_Re$Re.nc", schedule=TimeInterval(0.1),

text: `fields = (; u, v, w, ζ)` is legit
